attributes.action: Putting 'Plant a Tree Day' within our yearly calender.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose to start something similar to the idea of 'wear it pink day' but with the intention to get people throughout Britain to plant a tree instead, so to regenerate our now grey country with the much needed green. Just one day a year to make a massive difference. For one; raising awareness within our communities on the current climate change issue affecting us. The trees will obviously all be native to the uk and local councils will help coordinate planting.

rejection.details: What is it you wish the PM or Government to do?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
